verses.verse: Then<WG5119> Pharisees<WG5330> and<WG2532> scribes<WG1122> came<WG4334> to Jesus<WG2424> from<WG575> Jerusalem,<WG2414> saying,<WG3004>

"Why<WG5101> do<WG3845> your<WG4675> disciples<WG3101> disobey<WG3845> the tradition<WG3862> of the elders?<WG4245> For<WG1063> they don't<WG3756> wash<WG3538> their<WG846> hands<WG5495> when<WG3752> they eat<WG2068> bread.<WG740>"
He<WG1161> answered<WG611> them,<WG1223> "Why<WG5101> do<WG3845> you<WG5210> also<WG2532> disobey<WG3845> the commandment<WG1785> of God<WG2316> because<WG2316> of your<WG5216> tradition?<WG3862>"

For<WG1063> God<WG2316> commanded,<WG1781> <WG5091> 'Honor your<WG4675> father<WG3962> and<WG2532> your<WG4675> mother,<WG3384>' and,<WG2532> <WG2551> 'He who speaks evil of father<WG3962> or<WG2228> mother,<WG3384> let him be put<WG5053> to death.<WG2288>'

But<WG1161> you<WG5210> say,<WG3004> <WG3739> 'Whoever may<WG302> tell<WG2036> his father<WG3962> or<WG2228> his mother,<WG3384> "Whatever<WG3739> help<WG5623> you might<WG1437> otherwise have gotten from<WG1537> me<WG1700> is a<WG1437> gift devoted to God,<WG1435>"

he shall<WG3361> not<WG3756> honor<WG5091> his<WG846> father<WG3962> or<WG2228> mother.<WG3384>' You<WG2532> have made<WG208> the commandment<WG1785> of God<WG2316> void<WG208> because of<WG1223> your tradition.<WG3862>
You hypocrites!<WG5273> Well<WG2573> did<WG4395> Isaiah<WG2268> prophesy<WG4395> of<WG4012> you,<WG5216> saying,<WG3004>

<WG3778> 'These people<WG2992> draw near<WG1448> to me<WG3427> with<WG4750> their<WG846> mouth,<WG4750> and<WG2532> honor<WG5091> me<WG3165> with<WG5491> their lips;<WG5491> but<WG1161> their<WG846> heart<WG2588> is<WG568> far<WG4206> from<WG575> me.<WG1700>
And<WG1161> in vain<WG3155> do they worship<WG4576> me,<WG3165> teaching<WG1321> as doctrine<WG1319> rules<WG1778> made by men.<WG444>'"
He<WG2532> summoned<WG4341> the multitude,<WG3793> and said<WG2036> to them,<WG846> "Hear,<WG191> and<WG2532> understand.<WG4920>

That which enters<WG1525> into<WG1519> the mouth<WG4750> doesn't<WG3756> defile<WG2840> the man;<WG444> but<WG235> that which proceeds out<WG1607> of<WG1537> the mouth,<WG4750> this<WG5124> defiles<WG2840> the man.<WG444>"

Then<WG5119> the<WG846> disciples<WG3101> came,<WG4334> and said<WG2036> to him,<WG846> "Do you<WG1492> know that<WG3754> the Pharisees<WG5330> were offended,<WG4624> when they heard<WG191> this saying?<WG3056>"
But<WG1161> he answered,<WG611> "Every<WG3956> plant<WG5451> which<WG3739> my<WG3450> heavenly<WG3770> Father<WG3962> didn't<WG3756> plant<WG5451> will be uprooted.<WG1610>"

Leave them<WG846> alone.<WG863> They are<WG1526> blind<WG5185> guides<WG3595> of the blind.<WG5185> If<WG1437> the blind<WG5185> guide<WG3594> the blind,<WG5185> both<WG297> will fall<WG4098> into<WG1519> a pit.<WG999>"
Peter<WG4074> answered<WG611> him,<WG846> "Explain<WG5419> the<WG3778> parable<WG3850> to us.<WG2254>"
So<WG1161> Jesus<WG2424> said,<WG2036> "Do<WG2075> you<WG5210> also<WG2532> still<WG188> not understand?<WG801>

Don't<WG3768> you<WG3539> understand<WG3539> that<WG3754> whatever<WG3956> goes<WG1531> into the<WG1519> mouth<WG4750> passes<WG5562> into<WG1519> the belly,<WG2836> and<WG2532> then out<WG1544> of<WG1519> the body?<WG856>
But<WG1161> the things which proceed<WG1607> out<WG1537> of the mouth<WG4750> come out<WG1831> of<WG1537> the heart,<WG2588> and they<WG2548> defile<WG2840> the man.<WG444>

For<WG1063> out<WG1537> of the heart<WG2588> come<WG1831> forth evil<WG4190> thoughts,<WG1261> murders,<WG5408> adulteries,<WG3430> sexual<WG4202> sins,<WG2829> thefts, false testimony,<WG5577> and blasphemies.<WG988>
These<WG5023> are<WG2076> the things which defile<WG2840> the man;<WG444> but<WG1161> to eat<WG5315> with<WG5495> unwashed<WG449> hands<WG5495> doesn't<WG3756> defile<WG2840> the man.<WG444>"
Jesus<WG2424> went<WG1831> out<WG402> from there,<WG1564> and<WG2532> withdrew<WG402> into<WG1519> the region of Tyre<WG5184> and<WG2532> Sidon.<WG4605>

Behold,<WG2400> a Canaanite<WG5478> woman<WG1135> came<WG1831> out<WG575> from<WG3725> those<WG1565> borders,<WG3725> and cried,<WG2905> saying,<WG3004> "Have mercy<WG1653> on me,<WG3165> Lord,<WG2962> you son<WG5207> of David!<WG1138> My<WG3450> daughter<WG2364> is<WG1139> severely<WG2560> demonized!<WG1139>"

But<WG1161> he answered<WG611> her<WG846> not<WG3756> a word.<WG3056> His<WG846> disciples<WG3101> came<WG4334> and<WG2532> begged<WG2065> him,<WG846> saying,<WG3004> "Send<WG630> her<WG846> away;<WG630> for<WG3754> she cries<WG2896> after<WG3693> us.<WG2257>"
But<WG1161> he answered,<WG611> "I<WG649> wasn't<WG3756> sent<WG649> to<WG1487> anyone but<WG3361> the<WG1519> lost<WG622> sheep<WG4263> of the house<WG3624> of Israel.<WG2474>"
But<WG1161> she<WG2064> came and worshiped<WG4352> him,<WG846> saying,<WG3004> "Lord,<WG2962> help<WG997> me.<WG3427>"
But<WG1161> he answered,<WG611> "It<WG2036> is<WG2076> not<WG3756> appropriate<WG2570> to take<WG2983> the children<WG5043>'s bread<WG740> and<WG2532> throw<WG906> it to the dogs.<WG2952>"

But<WG1161> she said,<WG2036> "Yes,<WG3483> Lord,<WG2532> but<WG1063> even the dogs<WG2952> eat<WG2068> the<WG575> crumbs<WG5589> which fall<WG4098> from<WG575> their<WG846> masters<WG2962>' table.<WG5132>"

Then<WG5119> Jesus<WG2424> answered<WG611> her,<WG846> "Woman,<WG1135> great<WG3173> is your<WG4675> faith!<WG4102> Be it<WG1096> done to you<WG4671> even as<WG5613> you<WG4671> desire.<WG2309>" And<WG2532> her<WG846> daughter<WG2364> was healed<WG2390> from<WG575> that<WG1565> hour.<WG5610>

Jesus<WG2424> departed<WG3327> there,<WG1564> and<WG2532> came<WG2064> near<WG3844> to the sea<WG2281> of Galilee;<WG1056> and<WG2532> he went up<WG305> into<WG1519> the mountain,<WG3735> and<WG2532> sat there.<WG1563>

Great<WG4183> multitudes<WG3793> came to<WG4334> him,<WG846> having<WG2192> with<WG3326> them<WG1438> the lame,<WG5560> blind,<WG5185> mute,<WG2974> maimed,<WG2948> and<WG2532> many<WG4183> others,<WG2087> and<WG2532> they put<WG4496> them<WG846> down<WG4496> at<WG3844> his<WG2424> feet.<WG4228> He healed<WG2323> them,<WG846>

so that<WG5620> the multitude<WG3793> wondered<WG2296> when they saw<WG991> the mute<WG2974> speaking,<WG2980> injured whole,<WG5199> lame<WG5560> walking,<WG4043> and<WG2532> blind<WG5185> seeing<WG991>- and<WG2532> they<WG1392> glorified<WG1392> the God<WG2316> of Israel.<WG2474>

Jesus<WG2424> summoned<WG4341> his<WG846> disciples<WG3101> and said,<WG2036> "I have compassion<WG4697> on<WG1909> the multitude,<WG3793> because<WG3754> they continue with<WG4357> me<WG3427> now<WG2235> three<WG5140> days<WG2250> and<WG2532> have<WG2192> nothing<WG3756> to<WG5101> eat.<WG5315> I don't<WG3756> want<WG2309> to<WG5101> send<WG630> them<WG846> away<WG630> fasting,<WG3523> or they might<WG3379> faint<WG1590> on<WG1722> the way.<WG3598>"

The<WG846> disciples<WG3101> said<WG3004> to him,<WG846> "Where<WG4159> should we get<WG2254> so many<WG5118> loaves<WG740> in<WG1722> a deserted<WG2047> place as<WG5620> to satisfy<WG5526> so great<WG5118> a multitude?<WG3793>"
Jesus<WG2424> said<WG3004> to them,<WG846> "How many<WG4214> loaves<WG740> do you<WG2192> have?<WG1161>" They said,<WG2036> "Seven,<WG2033> and<WG1161> a few<WG3641> small fish.<WG2485>"
He<WG2532> commanded<WG2753> the multitude<WG3793> to sit down<WG377> on<WG1909> the ground;<WG1093>

and<WG2532> he took<WG2983> the<WG740> seven<WG2033> loaves<WG740> and<WG2532> the fish.<WG2486> He gave thanks<WG2168> and broke<WG2806> them,<WG2532> and gave<WG1325> to<WG3101> the<WG846> disciples,<WG3101> and<WG1161> the disciples<WG3101> to the multitudes.<WG3793>
They<WG2532> all<WG3956> ate,<WG5315> and<WG2532> were filled.<WG5526> They<WG2532> took up<WG142> seven<WG2033> baskets<WG4711> full<WG4134> of the broken<WG2801> pieces that were left over.<WG4052>
Those<WG1161> who ate<WG2068> were<WG2258> four thousand<WG5070> men,<WG435> besides<WG5565> women<WG1135> and<WG2532> children.<WG3813>
Then<WG2532> he sent away<WG630> the multitudes,<WG3793> got into<WG1684> the<WG1519> boat,<WG4143> and<WG2532> came<WG2064> into<WG1519> the borders<WG3725> of Magdala.<WG3093>
